## Import Dataset
```{r setup, include=TRUE}
dataframe <- read.csv("kc_house_data.csv")
#View(dataframe)
names(dataframe)
```
## First Plot
```{r}
plot(dataframe$price,dataframe$floors)
```

## Second Plot (qplot)
```{r}
library("ggplot2")
require("ggplot2")
qplot(dataframe$price,dataframe$waterfront)
```

## Third Plot
```{r}
thirdP <- ggplot(mapping = aes(x=dataframe$price,
                               y=dataframe$condition,
                               color=dataframe$price,
                               fill=dataframe$price))
thirdP+geom_jitter(width=1.0,size=4,alpha=0.6)
thirdP+geom_boxplot()
```
